skill.s1.name: Lily Revelation
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] as [color=#ffffa4][b]Bless DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy and gives all allies 1 stack of [color=#ffffa4][b][i]Bless[/i][/b][/color].
skill.s2.name: Healing Blessing
skill.s2.description: Restores [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] + [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color] to 1 ally and 1 other lowest [color=#ffffa4][b]HP[/b][/color] ally and dispels 2 debuffs.

Gives all healed allies 1 stack of [color=#ffffa4][b][i]Bless[/i][/b][/color] and restores [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] + [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color] at the start of their turn for 2 turns.
skill.s3.name: Gift of Spring
skill.s3.description: Consume all [color=#a6b74c][b][Nectar][/b][/color] and immediately restores [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] + [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color] to the main target and restores the same amount to the ally with the lowest [color=#ffffa4][b]HP[/b][/color] 2 times, repeat this 1 times with each stack of [color=#a6b74c][b][Nectar][/b][/color] consumed.

Increases all other allies' [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]7.5% Max HP[/b][/color] (Up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color]) with each stack of [color=#a6b74c][b][Nectar][/b][/color] consumed for 2 turns.
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Restores [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] + [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color] to all allies, dispels 1 debuff and gains [color=#ffffa4][b]16.5% Max HP[/b][/color] as [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color] (Up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color]) for 2 turns.
They also restores [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] + [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color] after action for 1 turn.
skill.p1.name: Blessing
skill.p1.description: Increase damage of healed target by ([color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] + [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] * [color=#ffffa4][b][i]Bless[/i][/b][/color] stacks, up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color]) for 1 turn.
skill.p2.name: Benevolence
skill.p2.description: At the start of battle, increase all allies' [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color] based on [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} Max HP[/b][/color] (Up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} HP[/b][/color]).
awareness.a0.name: Nursing Assessment
awareness.a0.description: At the start of battle, gain 1 stack of [color=#a6b74c][b][Nectar][/b][/color]: There is a [color=#ffffa4][b]100%[/b][/color] fixed chance to gain 1 stack of [color=#a6b74c][b][Nectar][/b][/color] when any ally is below [color=#ffffa4][b]70% HP[/b][/color]
awareness.a1.name: Pain Management
awareness.a1.description: Give all allies [color=#ffffa4][b]20% PEN[/b][/color] for 2 turns when overhealing.
awareness.a2.name: Nursing Care Plan
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s2][color=#fae8c2][b][u][Healing Blessing][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=hl][color=#fae8c2][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: Nursing Diagnosis
awareness.a3.description: [ref=s2][color=#fae8c2][b][u][Healing Blessing][/u][/b][/color][/ref] restores another ally and increase Healing Effect by [color=#ffffa4][b]20%[/b][/color] when the target is below [color=#ffffa4][b]50% HP[/b][/color].
awareness.a4.name: Nursing Intervention
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s1][color=#fae8c2][b][u][Lily Revelation][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s3][color=#fae8c2][b][u][Gift of Spring][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Postoperative Care
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#fae8c2][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Increase the duration of the [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color] increase effect and the regeneration effect from [ref=hl][color=#fae8c2][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 1 turn.
awareness.a6.name: CPR
awareness.a6.description: Immediately revive and restore [color=#ffffa4][b]40% Max HP[/b][/color] + [color=#ffffa4][b]1,200 HP[/b][/color] to an ally when they faint, once per battle.
